auth.token: Only use this if you have an bot account, else just remove this line
auth.email: Discord email here (remove this like if you are using the token)
auth.password: Discord password here (remove this like if you are using the token)

admin_id: Your user id of your OWN! account not the bot's. You can get this by \@yourdiscordname but don't copy over the <@ and >
status: Some status u want on your discord bot...
